title: Active Partition Recovery Enterprise 9.0.4 Incl Key ''DLM-Sliman
description:
Active Partition Recovery Enterprise 9.0.4 | By Dlm SLimani (KurdTM)

Active@ Partition Recovery is a powerful software utility, designed to restore accidentally deleted partitions. Active@ Partition Recovery can restore any deleted partition or logical drive (FAT12, FAT16, FAT32, NTFS, NTFS5). If a Master Boot Record and partition information backup is available on a floppy drive, then using Active@ Partition Recovery you can recover and restore Master Boot Record.

Active@ Partition Recovery major features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Recover deleted partitions (FAT and NTFS)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restore deleted FAT and NTFS Logical Drives
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create Drive Image - for backup purposes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scan hard drives and detect deleted FAT and NTFS partitions and/or Drives
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Preview files and folders on deleted partition or drive, to recover proper data
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Backup MBR (Master Boot Record), Partition Table, Boot Sectors
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Restore MBR, Partition Table and Boot Sectors from backup if damaged

In addition to above you can also:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Undelete partitions (Primary and Extended)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and restore Raw Disk Image back to HDD
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep this program on a bootable floppy disk due to its small size
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Display complete Physical and Logical Drive information
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use it with ease: controlled by only arrows, ENTER, ESC keys

OS : Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 
Language : English
